link.title: Thornville Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

div.span: Welcome to Northern Local School District!

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 backgroundcolor topFeatured

div.p: The Northern Local Board of Education will be having their regularly scheduled monthly meeting on Thursday April 16, 2020 beginning at 6:30 p.m.
In order to stay compliant with the social distancing order, the public may attend the meeting virtually by joining the link below;

td.div: A copy of a letter going home with students today containing important information regarding our exteded break is linked below.
Please note that Moday, March 16th is a staff professional development day and students will not be in session.
Please take the 2018-19 Elementary Parent Title I Survey

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 backgroundcolor masterC

div.span: The kindergarten screening scheduled for the week of April 14 has been cancelled due to the Stay at Home order of the Governor. Screenings will be rescheduled at a later date.

td.b: What it Means to be a General
